name: Skywrath Mage
title: Dragonus
lore: A winged sorcerer devoted to his fallen queen, Dragonus rains magical fury upon his enemies.

arcaneBolt.name: Arcane Bolt
arcaneBolt.description: Fires a slow-moving bolt of arcane energy that deals damage based on intelligence.

concussiveShot.name: Concussive Shot
concussiveShot.description: Automatically targets the closest enemy, damaging and slowing them.

ancientSeal.name: Ancient Seal
ancientSeal.description: Silences an enemy and amplifies all magic damage they take.

mysticFlare.name: Mystic Flare
mysticFlare.description: Rains down magical energy in an area, dealing massive damage split among enemies.
